Title: House of Flying Daggers
Writer: Feng Li, Bin Wang, Yimou Zhang
Actors: Takeshi Kaneshiro, Andy Lau, Ziyi Zhang, Dandan Song
Plot: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 26 wins & 73 nominations.
Production: Elite Group Enterprises, China Film Co-Production Corporation, Beijing New Picture Film Co., Edko Films, Zhang Yimou Studio
